thread.title: James Comey Hearing: FBI Investigating Donald Trump-Russia Links, Coordination
thread.title_full: James Comey Hearing: FBI Investigating Donald Trump-Russia Links, Coordination

author: Fox News Insider
title: James Comey Hearing: FBI Investigating Donald Trump-Russia Links, Coordination
text:
7 P 
The First 100 Days breaks down Comey's testimony and the president's response with Rep. Peter King and Newt Gingrich . 8 P 
Trump is holding a big rally in Kentucky. The O'Reilly Factor takes you there live, and then brings you powerful analysis. 9 P 
Tucker Carlson Tonight gets insight on Comey's testimony and what impact it will have on D.C. Then at 10:00p ET , Hannity brings you must-see reaction to the explosive hearing. The First 100 Days Wallace: I Was Struck by What Trump & Merkel Didn't Talk About Mar 17, 2017 8:30pm President Trump and German Chancellor Angela Merkel held a meeting at the Oval Office on Friday, followed by a joint press conference minutes later. 'Bad Dog!': Huckabee Slams Rapper Bow Wow for Tweet Targeting Melania Trump Mar 16, 2017 7:59pm On "The First 100 Days" tonight, Mike Huckabee had some strong words for rapper Bow Wow, who targeted First Lady Melania Trump in a vulgar social media post. 'This is Ancient History': Ryan Blasts Leaked Audio of Him Criticizing Trump Mar 14, 2017 7:22pm House Speaker Paul Ryan reacted to the release of leaked audio of him criticizing then-Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump.
